title: KD's Injury, MLK Day Recap, MVP Race | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: KD's Injury, MLK Day Recap, MVP Race | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
NBA is in full swing and so is WHAT'S BURNIN'. On the latest episode, Matt and Stak react to KD's injury, recap MLK day, and look ahead at the current MVP race.
